Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh removed both Irish openers in the third over
Hardik Pandya claimed a wicket in the seventh over
Jasprit Bumrah struck again in the ninth
Arshdeep ended with 3 wickets for just 12 runs
Bumrah and Pandya picked up 2 wickets each
Ireland folded for just 96 runs in 16 overs
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's fast bowling attack wreaked havoc on Ireland
The pitch conditions at the stadium have come under severe scrutiny
Delany and Little added 27 runs for the ninth wicket
